original_title: L’État des lieux sera dressé à onze heures en présence de la femme du poète
overview: Poet and radio producer Franck Venaille’s study is being emptied. Micha Venaille and Martin Verdet find in it many recording of his voice. The place becomes a stage of all that is never done in a dead man’s room.
title: The Inventory Will Be Drawn Up at 11 a.m. in the Presence of the Poet’s Wife
